reviews.review: This game is simple and fun. Speedy thing go in, speedy thing go out, speedy thing beat game fast.

This is simply a masterpiece. By far the most enjoyment I have gotten from spending under $20. I would 100% recommend to another. I love playing with my brothers, and the characters are amazing! I wish that games were still made to this caliber, but I'm afraid they're not. Anyway, fantastic game. Would definitely recommend!
not as good as the first but fun

One of my favourite games of all time! So many hours clocked in this gem ;)
Incredible puzzle design that is challenging but not impossible and hilarious jokes midway through.

One of the best game Valve can offer to you with number 2

If you like puzzle games this might be for you. 

The story behind this game is very interesting, the characters are funny, and the places you go to are cool and look amazing. Now, this is my opinion, you and others might have different opinions towards this game.

People that haven't played this should. People that haven't played it in a very long time should get back to it.

Just a quick review,
The characters are extremely charming and well voice acted. The story really pulled at my heartstrings, and the gameplay stays fresh and new throughout the game without getting repetitive because of new features and mechanics added on throughout the well though out puzzles/
I crush my friend and he  dead
By far the best puzzle game I've ever played, solo and with friends
A great sequel to the first game with fun and interesting levels
i like the character design and the overall design.i also like the wheatley boss fight at the end.i totally recommend this game!
you might be asking your self... "is portal 2 really the game for me?" and all i have to say in response is if you like edge-less safety cubes, this will be the game for you
game insanely fun> open your mind!! not easiest really gets your brain going

I said it with the original and I'll say it again: Buy it!
Thinking with portals solving puzzle rooms with the portal gun is alot of fun

This game is an excellent sequel to the original Portal. The game mechanics are fun and exciting. The story adds a lot to the lore without making it seem like developers are milking it for cash. You can really tell that a lot of inspiration and hard work went in to making this game.
Its alot of fun, the story, the puzzles, everything. I wish more items were available at the test chamber editor
I have fallen in love with puzzle games and this is a game that started it. Amazing plot, jokes, visuals (even after years) and of course the puzzles.

Probably the best video-game every made, the sequel to: Probably the best video-game every made.

In my opinion, this game was successful on so many levels, it ranks easily as one of the best games I've ever played. The dialogue was amazingly well-scripted, and the puzzles require just the right level of competency to figure out. 10/10.
